name: Never Land
description:
never land is a Game made for Weekly Game Jam 151, it was made in JUST 6 DAYS, it kinda simulates the trampoline sport in the Olympics, if you finish all the levels then you are a very good player, because it is hard!

|||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||||
                                        

Controls

WASD or Arrow Keys - Moving

Escape - Pause
